rows.label: qev030604_MSG0001
rows.name:
We are short on this. Short on that. We do not have
enough to hold proper Prone wedding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0002
rows.name:
Prone men are drunk before rite of marriage begins!
I should beat them into helping. But they are more
nuisance than help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Oh! You are [ST:playername ]!
You brought bride and groom together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0004
rows.name:
I thank you. My younger brother Nemard needed help.
Help to win fine woman like Heptana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Duna that it couldn't have happened without you.

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that it's due to Nemard's kindness.

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0005
rows.name: You made best decision for indecisive fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0006
rows.name: Though it is still mystery to me why Heptana accepted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0007
rows.name:
Heh. I am pleased to hear it. Prone value strength
above all else. Kindness seldom earns praise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0008
rows.name: So! Will you help prepare for rite of marriage?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0009
rows.name:
We need tough humpsteaks for feast.
Everyone else is too drunk to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0010
rows.name: I will finish rest of preparations while you find meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0011
rows.name:
As much as I tease, I love my brother.
I want his wedding to be perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0012
rows.name:
Prone rites of marriage are all about meat.
Also strong drink. But mostly meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0013
rows.name: And tough humpsteaks are main course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0014
rows.name:
You have done much for my brother.
I am sure you will find freshest steaks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0015
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]. Everyone is terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0016
rows.name:
My younger brother marries before me.
Now rest of clan calls me spinster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0017
rows.name:
I will quiet them when I find Prone man.
Man who can slay mandos with single blow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0030
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0031
rows.name: Try to cheer Duna up.

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0040
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0041
rows.name:
Change the subject by telling Duna
that you have what she asked for.

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0018
rows.name:
You are kind. Also strong.
I wish I knew Prone man like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0019
rows.name:
But none exist. Mother says don't be picky.
Yet I will not be mate of disappointing man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0020
rows.name:
Enough. I talk too much. Makes my mind foggy.
I asked you to get something, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0021
rows.name: Er, what? Did you need me for something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Ah! Sorry. I forgot I sent you to hunt meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0023
rows.name:
Older guests getting drunk. So we start rite of
marriage early.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0024
rows.name: Thanks to your hunting, wedding is ready to—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Oh! So this is famous [ST:playername ].
You are fine [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]...for Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0026
rows.name:
I am Galba Vassago. I am victor of thousand battles.
I was strongest warrior on Tormein![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0027
rows.name:
Guh ha ha HA! Aliens sing and dance at weddings.
But Prone are born to fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0028
rows.name:
Let us mark special day with glorious battle!
You and I will trade blows until we cannot stand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0029
rows.name:
Galba is drunk. Also restless.
He hasn't fought since coming to Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0030
rows.name:
Leave old man be. We have meat.
We can begin rite of marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0050
rows.name: Back Off

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0051
rows.name: Avoid fighting Galba as Duna suggests.

rows.label: qev030604_JNK0060
rows.name: Step Up

rows.label: qev030604_SEL0061
rows.name: Accept Galba's challenge.

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0031
rows.name:
You call yourself warrior? Face me! I am Prone who
beat dozen Cavern cowards. Even with arms tied
behind back! I am Prone who—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0032
rows.name: Ugh. Galba will talk for hours now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0033
rows.name:
We cannot start rite of marriage until he stops.
Perhaps you can shut him up with force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0034
rows.name:
Yes. Good! Face me! I will show you strength.
Strength that felled 30 Cavern Clan dogs in one battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0035
rows.name:
Bwa ha ha! I will wait for you in Primordia.
On plains northeast of Sayram Lake. No running away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0036
rows.name: Oh ho! You have bravery of my namesake, vassago![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0037
rows.name:
Bwa ha! I will show you my strength. Strength that
felled 30 Cavern Clan dogs in one battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0038
rows.name:
Meet me in Primordia. On plains northeast of Sayram
Lake. We will give all to fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0039
rows.name:
*sigh* Old man is hopeless. You must go lay him flat.
Then drag him back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0044
rows.name:
We are short on this. Short on that. We do not have
enough to hold proper Prone wedding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0045
rows.name:
Prone men are drunk before rite of marriage begins!
I should beat them into helping. But they are more
nuisance than help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0047

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0082
rows.name:
*sigh* Old man is hopeless. You must go lay him flat.
Then drag him back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0083
rows.name:
Galba Vassago seems like old, drunk blowhard. But he
was fierce warrior in his time. Do not take him lightly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0084
rows.name:
Now make him shut up so we can begin rite of
marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0085
rows.name:
You and Galba are back?
Rite of marriage can begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0086
rows.name:
Ha ha! Nemard looks so nervous.
You should talk to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0100
rows.name:
Do you seek Nemard? He is gone.
Went to make horn-ring of betrothal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0101
rows.name:
He is poor hunter. But always does what must be done.
He will find beast horn for ring somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0102
rows.name: One fit to impress even fierce Heptana![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0103
rows.name:
Do you seek Nemard? He is gone.
Went to make horn-ring of betrothal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0104
rows.name:
He is poor hunter. But always does what must be done.
He will find beast horn for ring somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030604_MSG0105
rows.name: One that will make sensitive Enneana weep for joy![ST:wait ]
